title: The new Task Manager in Windows 11 will soon use your theme color
content:
Microsoft is making the new Windows 11 Task Manager a bit more colorful with a future update, making it so that the app uses your chosen theme color in more areas. The update was announced during this month’s Windows Insider webcast, and it’s another step in bringing the Task Manager more in line with the

The post The new Task Manager in Windows 11 will soon use your theme color appeared first on XDA.
description: Microsoft is working on updates to the Windows 11 Task Manager which will enable the app to use your chosen theme color more prominently.
